game.name: Demons Roots
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In a final struggle for survival, demonkind again invaded the human world. However, the world they return to after years in the darkness isn't the same as it once was...
game.shortDescriptionEn: In a final struggle for survival, demonkind again invaded the human world. However, the world they return to after years in the darkness isn't the same as it once was...

reviewHighlights.text: Let Demons Roots cook. What started out as a rather generic RPGMaker slowly turned into something incredible. This game has a really, really touching...
